title: Tocca Mini Body Lotion Cleopatra, 2 Ounce
features: A body lotion enriched with natural extracts from sweet almond, shea butter and honey to moisturize and soothe dry, sensitive skin
Top Notes: bitter grapefruit, lush greens, cassis bud
Middle Notes: white jasmine, peach nectar, tuberose
Base Notes: warm patchouli, golden amber, rich vanilla musk
description: A body lotion enriched with natural extracts from sweet almond, shea butter and honey to moisturize and soothe dry, sensitive skin. Cleopatra, the iconic seductress, commanded ships and the hearts of men in equal measure. This fragrance memorably combines some of her personal favorites, including enticing grapefruit, luxuriant Egyptian jasmine and rich Indian patchouli.
